title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 143.8 - Termination of shift pay differentials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 143.8 - Termination of shift pay differentials

State Regulations
A shift pay differential shall be terminated: (a) for an employee when he ceases to be
employed on the work shift, in the occupation, or in the geographic area if
applicable, for which such differential was authorized, or
(b) for an occupation, shift or area, when
the Director of Classification and Compensation, with approval of the Director
of the Budget, determines that the basis for providing a shift pay differential
for such occupation, shift or area no longer exists. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
143.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
